name: Elise the Devil
description: After Devil Iblis who wants to conquer the world is defeated by the hero, she is so weak and becomes a little girl. She swears her revenge, changed her name into Elise and starts her journey to take back the power. Can Elise finally revenge successfully? Or degenerate into a sex slave?
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP 处理器: 1.2 GHz 内存: 1 GB RAM 图形: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card 存储空间: 需要 2 GB 可用空间
